name: Incorporated Society of British Advertisers
goal: We are the representative body for British advertisers.  We seek to promote responsible advertising and advertising self regulation as well as give advice to advertisers about their relationship with the media, agencies and regulatory and legislative authorities.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Information Society, Internal Market
euInitiatives:
Consumer law reviews
data protection and privacy issues and laws
AVMS directive review
